q: House Majority Leader Dick Armey ( R-TX), now head of FreedomWorks, said that Mike Pence could potentially be a second coming of Reagan. Oh Mike Pence , why have you forsaken Dick Armey ? Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. "You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there."
